suggestions.recommendation: Add a punchier hook in the introduction that highlights a bold insight from your data.
suggestions.example: Lead with a stat like "Teams using AI in content production ship 5x faster."

suggestions.recommendation: Increase the frequency of the phrase "AI content workflow" in the piece and add an internal link to your toolkit blog.
suggestions.example: Include 3-5 mentions of primary keywords throughout the content

suggestions.recommendation: Break longer paragraphs into scannable bullets and add a CTA at the end of each section.
suggestions.example: Use bullet points for key insights and include "Learn more" buttons

suggestions.recommendation: Add 2-3 citations from industry reports or research studies to strengthen credibility.
suggestions.example: Reference Gartner, McKinsey, or Forrester data points

suggestions.recommendation: Add more numbered lists and clear section headers for better AI parsing.
suggestions.example: Use H2/H3 headers and step-by-step numbered instructions
